channel.title: Hey guys please read. really need help!
channel.description: Hey guys, well ive got my own source and server but...i never learnt how to create shops and make npc's auto spawn if they die, if someone could help me id really appreciate it!

item.title: Hey guys please read. really need help!
item.dc:creator: @army_life army_life
item.description:
@army_life wrote:

Dude check in the tutorials section…

How to make a NPC spawn…

Go to autospawn.cfg

go to where you want to place it and use the code…

spawn = NPCID	XCORD	YCORD	0	0	0	0	0	1	NPCNAME

This will make your NPC stationary and not move, also will auto spawn once its killed.

Read full topic
